data.meta_description: So exciting to have this technology on the new McLaren 750S
data.text:
🚙 FOR SALE: 2016 Honda Pilot - Spacious, Reliable, and Well-Maintained! 🚙 Are you on the lookout for a versatile SUV that combines comfort, reliability, and ample space for your family adventures? Look no further! Presenting a fantastic deal - a 2016 Honda Pilot with 129,223 km on the odometer! Key Features: 🌟 Year: 2016 🌟 Make: Honda 🌟 Model: Pilot 🌟 Mileage: 129,223 km 🌟 Condition: Well-Maintained 🌟 Color: Gray 🌟 Transmission: Automatic 🌟 Fuel: Gasoline 🌟 Price: $23,495+HST* Description: This 2016 Honda Pilot is a midsize SUV that combines a powerful performance with a spacious and comfortable interior. Whether you're embarking on a family road trip or navigating city streets, the Honda Pilot is equipped to handle it all. Highlights: ✅ Well-Maintained: With 129,223 km on the odometer, this Honda Pilot has been meticulously cared for. Regular servicing and maintenance ensure that it remains in excellent condition. ✅ Spacious Interior: The three-row seating configuration offers ample space for passengers and cargo, making it an ideal choice for families or those who need extra room. ✅ Smooth Performance: The 2016 Honda Pilot delivers a smooth and comfortable ride, coupled with responsive handling. It's well-suited for both city driving and highway cruising. ✅ Safety Features: Equipped with advanced safety features, including airbags, ABS brakes, and stability control, the Pilot prioritizes the safety of its occupants. ✅ Towing Capability: If you have towing needs, the Honda Pilot is up to the task, providing a towing capacity that adds to its versatility. Why Choose This Honda Pilot? Reliability: Honda is known for producing reliable vehicles, and the Pilot is a testament to that reputation. Versatility: Whether you need a family-friendly SUV or a vehicle capable of handling various road conditions, the Pilot fits the bill. Well-Documented Maintenance: The well-maintained history of this vehicle ensures peace of mind for the new owner. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a spacious and well-maintained 2016 Honda Pilot with 129,223 km. To schedule a test drive or inquire about the vehicle contacted me @ 647-470-3591

Fascinating image, isn't it? 💥 Let me tell you about the connection between the car and the aircraft. You may recognize the Lockheed Corporation SR-71. Although its last flight was in the late 90s, Blackbird remains the fastest airbreathing manned aircraft with a top speed of 2,200mph...until its successor (the SR-72) hits the sky. The Porsche is a creation of the French guys with Mechanical Hearts & Artistic Souls...I'm talking about Machine Revival It's a 1968 Porsche 912-based build fitted with a flat six 993 M64 block. A pair of carbon buckets, a Sparco steering wheel, and the right amount of pedals connect the vehicle with its driver. Make no mistake by looking at its silhouette! The Porsche was built for one purpose....Time Trials! While 300 horsepower is not a number to be impressed with nowadays, the Porsche weighs just 1,900 lbs, and it's dressed with performance goodies. What do the car and the spy plane have in common? Like most top-notch builders, the French gearheads believe that every car deserves a name...and this Porsche they named after the aircraft - "913 Blackbird" It may not fly at 2,200 mph, but it's surely capable of propelling its pilot with fury on the runway. #porsche #automotive #classiccars

The Volkswagen ID.7 has become the first ever vehicle to achieve an overall rating of ‘very good’ in the independent test performed by ADAC, Europe’s largest automobile club! 👏 Last month, the ID.3 clinched the Best Buy-award from Test-Aankoop/Test Achat (see: https://lnkd.in/eWZaP8b8). Now the ID.7 has received a historic top score in ADAC's vehicle test, becoming the very first vehicle to be rated as 'very good'. Here's a short resume of their findings: ▶ Every year, 100 vehicles are put through their paces bij the ADAC, testing them according to more than 350 criteria in seven main categories. The ID.7 received outstanding scores in the categories of engine/drive (1.0), safety (1.1), environment/ecological test (1.2) and comfort (1.5). ▶ The electric saloon also impressed in the other main categories that contributed to the overall rating. For instance, the areas of driving characteristics (2.1), body/luggage compartment (2.3) and interior (2.4) were rated as ‘good’. Since the two categories of environment/ecological test and safety have the highest weighting, the overall score for the ID.7 was 1.5, resulting in its historical overall rating of ‘very good’. 💬 I've personally driven the ID.7 over a longer period and came away very impressed by its overall comfort, silence and zen-factor. If you haven't tried our electric flagship yet, please do so at your nearest Volkswagen-dealer and get ready to be amazed! Please find the full report here -> https://lnkd.in/eYs42GNE #Volkswagen #ID7 #VolkswagenID7 #VWID7 #IDfamily #ADAC
